meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving multiple volumes.
meanings.sent1: The encyclopedia set was a multivolume collection of books.
meanings.sent2: The multivolume series of novels kept readers entertained for months.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the multivolume dictionary to the library felt like a workout.
meanings.sent4: Her multivolume knowledge on the subject was as vast as an ocean.
meanings.sent5: The multivolume nature of the project required careful organization.

meanings.definition: A work or publication that is divided into multiple volumes.
meanings.sent1: The historian's multivolume on ancient civilizations was a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed the multivolume from the library to read over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The multivolume on gardening made for a heavy backpack on the hike.
meanings.sent4: His life story was like a multivolume, each chapter revealing a new adventure.
meanings.sent5: The multivolume of poetry was a treasure trove of beautiful verses.
